front.title: Certificate Management Service for The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This draft defines a Credential Service that allows Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) User Agents (UAs) to use a SIP package to discover the certificates of other users. This mechanism allows user agents that want to contact a given Address-of-Record (AOR) to retrieve that AOR's certificate by subscribing to the Credential Service. The Credential Service also allows users to store and retrieve their own certificates and private keys.
